ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Input on Recent digest Topics
ygData.msgSnippet: wrong, the ss gloves can be used at any level, its a permanent effect, great to raise swimming skill in felwithe, arm your jig of vigor song, hit autorun and
ygData.messageBody:
wrong, the ss gloves can be used at any level, its a permanent effect, great
to raise swimming skill in felwithe, arm your jig of vigor song, hit autorun
and find a nice little corner in the water to keep swimming against and go
watch a movie.

I think my swimming is 196 now. Its the only thing i could do at one point
due to extreme lag and going LD. i decided to raise swimming skill instead
of dying to router problems in the states.

Minkin

-----Original Message-----
From: Scott Malin [mailto:Thanos0000@...]
Sent: January 12, 2001 11:09 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Input on Recent digest Topics


From: "Gordon Hughes" <ghughes@...>
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Input on Recent digest Topics


> I don't mean to offend here, but any group that goes to Kedge relying on
our
> aquatic ayre is one can short of a six-pack.

Agreed

> Rebreathers, Fishbone Earrings and the like are definitely the order of
the
> day. Also, if you can get your hands on some Singing Steel Gauntlets, you
> can eliminate the Ayre, irrespective of level.

Not quite, all the kunark armor has a level restriction of 45th to use the
right click effects. If someone is going to use the entry level area they
are really better off just making friends with a shaman, druid or ranger.
Rebreathers and waterstones are great as well. The problem with bringing a
mage down there is that soon they realize they don't need help.

"Come on, let me join your group"
"Nah, you'll only slow me down."

> Just because we get a water breathing song, doesn't mean that we're set
for
> Kedge. It's hard enough down there twisting songs in battle and staying
> alive. Add to that the necessity to twist Ayre and you'll have a very
> difficult time.

The only time I've seen a bard since Ayre is in battle with Phinigal, he has
a nice little AoE dispell and not all of us had Fishbone earrings, it gives
us a few more seconds to get a breath on the dispelled person.


Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
